title: [Large-Scale] Integrated Theory and Practice Mathematics Instructional Design: Project-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics education theory and basic practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional Design Education Centered on Real-life Problem-Solving Projects Using Digital Devices

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more teaching strategies that explain the connection between theory and practice.
Learners can propose methods to integrate theoretical frameworks with practical elements when designing project-based activities.
Learners can diagnose the level of integration between theory and practice during the project execution process using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
